segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, trying to get cookies without their mom noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the boy is stretching up on that little stool, determined to reach the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is so patient, just waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the mom is completely clueless, just drying dishes like it’s any other day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water overflowing is a bit of a problem, but it’s almost funny how she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll ever realize what’s happening behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so full of life and little moments of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It reminds me of when I was a kid, trying to sneak treats without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get away with it, just this once.
segments.speaker: PAR
